description: React component implementing a Loyalty Program section for a restaurant website. It displays member benefits, current special offers, and a signup form with validation and simulated submission logic.

methods.name: validateForm
methods.description: Validates the membership data form fields (email, first name, phone) with specific rules and returns error messages if validation fails.

methods.name: handleInputChange
methods.description: Handles updates to form input fields, updating the component state and clearing existing error messages for the modified field.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Handles the submission of the signup form, including validation, simulated API call, success/error handling, and UI state updates.

methods.name: toggleSignupForm
methods.description: Toggles the visibility of the signup form and resets submission status and errors.
